tasks.title: Define Core Auction Architecture
tasks.description: Translate ARKIVE Auctions Phase 1 goals (MVP auction listing, bidding, and settlement flows) into a core architecture for listings, bidding, and settlements, ensuring seamless linkage to MyARK Golden Records.

tasks.title: Map Data Flows from MyARK and TrueManifest
tasks.description: Define how item data, claim outcomes, and Golden Records from MyARK and TrueManifest flow into ARKIVE Auctions, including status updates back to those systems.

tasks.title: Build Auction Browsing & Detail Views
tasks.description: Implement core ARKIVE Auctions UI for browsing auctions, viewing listing details, and understanding item provenance from MyARK and TrueLedger.

tasks.title: Expose Provenance and Claim Status
tasks.description: Surface claim status, provenance badges, and risk signals from TrueLedger and TrueManifest in ARKIVE Auctions interfaces.

tasks.title: Ensure Mobile Identity & Session Integrity
tasks.description: Align mobile authentication, session handling, and deep links between ARKIVE Auctions, MyARK, and TrueManifest for Phase 1.

tasks.title: Maintain Regression Coverage
tasks.description: Maintain regression suites covering listing creation, bidding, payments, and MyARK/TrueManifest data ingestion into ARKIVE Auctions.
